import React from 'react' import {Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Rating} from 'react-simple-star-rating' const SingleProduct = ({product}) => { if(product.price > 50){ return ( {/*
{product.title}
{product.site}

Ksh {product.price}

 */}
{product.title.truncate(30)}
{product.site}

Ksh {product.price}

) } } export default SingleProduct
